pasta.web.controller

Class UnitTestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.web.controller.UnitTestController

  • @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="unitTest/")
public class UnitTestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for Unit Test functions.

    Handles mappings of $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/...

    Only teaching staff can access this url.

    Since:
    2013-08-15
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

      • viewUnitTest

        @RequestMapping(value="{testName}/")
public java.lang.String viewUnitTest(@PathVariable(value="testName")
                                           java.lang.String testName,
                                           org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/{testName}/

        View the details of a unit test. If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home. ATTRIBUTES:

        unikeyThe PASTAUser for the logged in user
        unitTestThe UnitTest for this test
        latestResultThe UnitTestResult for the execution of the test run of the unit testing code.
        nodeThe root FileTreeNode for the root of the unit test code.
        JSP:
        • assessment/view/unitTest
        Parameters:
        testName - the short name (no whitespace) of the test.
        model - the model being used
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "assessment/view/unitTest"

      • downloadUnitTest

        @RequestMapping(value="{testName}/download/")
public void downloadUnitTest(@PathVariable(value="testName")
                                   java.lang.String testName,
                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/{testName}/download/

        Download the unit test code on the machine. If the user has not authenticated or is not a tutor: do nothing Otherwise create a zip file with the name: $testName$.zip

        Parameters:
        testName - the short name (no whitespace) of the unit test
        model - the model being used
        response - the response being used to serve the zip

      • updateTestCode

        @RequestMapping(value="{testName}/",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String updateTestCode(@PathVariable(value="testName")
                                             java.lang.String testName,
                                             @ModelAttribute(value="newUnitTestModel")
                                             NewUnitTest form,
                                             @ModelAttribute(value="submission")
                                             Submission subForm,
                                             org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/{testName}/ - POST

        Upload some code to test the unit test on the production machine or to update the unit tests on the system. If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home. If the user is an instructor:

        • updating code - done using UnitTestManager.updateUnitTestCode(NewUnitTest)
        • testing test code - done using UnitTestManager.testUnitTest(Submission, String)
        Parameters:
        testName - the short name (no whitespace) of the test
        form - used for updating the unit test code
        subForm - used for testing the unit test code
        result - binding results used for feedback.
        model - the model being used.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "redirect:/mirror/"

      • viewUnitTest

        @RequestMapping(value="")
public java.lang.String viewUnitTest(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/

        List all unit tests on the system. If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home. ATTRIBUTES:

        unikeyThe PASTAUser for the currently logged in user.
        allUnitTestsA collection of all UnitTest of all unit tests on the system.
        JSP:
        • assessment/viewAll/unitTest
        Parameters:
        model - the model being used.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "assessment/viewAll/unitTest"

      • home

        @RequestMapping(value="",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String home(@ModelAttribute(value="newUnitTestModel")
                                   NewUnitTest form,
                                   org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/ - POST

        Add a new unit test to the system. If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home. If the user is an instructor:

        • Check if the name is unique, if it's not reject with UnitTest.New.NameNotUnique
        • Otherwise, add using UnitTestManager.addUnitTest(NewUnitTest)
        • Redirect back using $PASTAUrl$/mirror/
        Parameters:
        form - the new unit test form
        result - the binding result used for feedback
        model - the model being used
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "redirect:/mirror/"

      • deleteUnitTest

        @RequestMapping(value="delete/{testName}/")
public java.lang.String deleteUnitTest(@PathVariable(value="testName")
                                             java.lang.String testName,
                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/delete/{testName}/

        Delete a unit test from the system. If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home. If the user is an instructor: delete the unit test using UnitTestManager.removeUnitTest(String) then redirect to $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/

        Parameters:
        testName - the short name (no whitespace) of the unit test.
        model - the model being used.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "redirect:../../"

      • testedUnitTest

        @RequestMapping(value="tested/{testName}/")
public java.lang.String testedUnitTest(@PathVariable(value="testName")
                                             java.lang.String testName,
                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        $PASTAUrl$/unitTest/tested/{testName}/

        Mark a unit test as tested. If the user has not authenticated: redirect to login. If the user is not a tutor: redirect to home. If the user is an instructor: mark the unit test as tested.

        Parameters:
        testName - the short name (no whitespace) of the test
        model - the model being used.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/login/" or "redirect:/home/" or "redirect:../../$testName$/"
